title: ICE: Err on value: "core", map_unit_fn.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![crate_type = "lib"] fn _y() { vec![42].iter().map(drop); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (22f247c6f 2023-03-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 22f247c6f3ed388cb702d01c2ff27da658a8b353 commit-date: 2023-03-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
